---
id: massa-web3-wallet
title: Wallet operations
---

# Wallet operations

Wallet operations are accessible under the wallet sub-client which is accessible via the wallet() method on the client.
WalletClient documentation can be found [here](https://web3.docs.massa.net/classes/WalletClient.html).

Here is the list of available operations:

### Create account

Static method to generate a new account.

```ts
const newWalletAccount: IAccount =
  await WalletClient.walletGenerateNewAccount();
```

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:314](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L314)

### Get account

Static method to get an account from a given private key.

```ts
const account: IAccount = await WalletClient.getAccountFromSecretKey(
  "private_key"
);
```

Defined in [src/web3/WalletClient.ts:345](https://github.com/massalabs/massa-web3/blob/41f5634/src/web3/WalletClient.ts#L345)

### Add accounts to wallet

After creating accounts or getting it from private keys, you can add them to a wallet.

```ts
const accountGenerated: IAccount =
  await WalletClient.walletGenerateNewAccount();
const accountFromSecretKey: IAccount =
  await WalletClient.getAccountFromSecretKey("secret_key");

await web3Client
  .wallet()
  .addAccountsToWallet([accountGenerated, accountFromSecretKey]);
```

### Add secret keys to wallet

You can directly add an account to the wallet by providing its secret key.
Returns the list of accounts that were added to the wallet.

```ts
const addedAccounts = await web3Client
  .wallet()
  .addSecretKeysToWallet(["secret_key1", "secret_key2"]);
```

### Set base account

Set the base account that will be used as the default account for the wallet.

```ts
const account: IAccount = await WalletClient.walletGenerateNewAccount();
await web3Client.wallet().setBaseAccount(account);
```

### Get base account

Retrieves the default (base) account of the wallet.

```ts
const baseAccount = web3Client.wallet().getBaseAccount();
```

### Get wallet account by address

Retrieves a wallet account based on its address.

```ts
const walletAccount: IAccount | undefined = web3Client
  .wallet()
  .getWalletAccountByAddress("address");
```

### Get wallet accounts

Retrieves all accounts stored in the wallet.

```ts
const walletAccounts: Array<IAccount> = web3Client.wallet().getWalletAccounts();
```

### Remove addresses from wallet

Remove a list of addresses from the wallet.

```ts
web3Client.wallet().removeAddressesFromWallet([account1, account2]);
```

### Clean wallet

Removes all accounts from the wallet, even the base account.

```ts
web3Client.wallet().cleanWallet();
```

### Get account balance

Retrieves the balance of an account, or null if the account is not found.

```ts
const balance: IBalance | null = await web3Client
  .wallet()
  .getAccountBalance("address");
```

### Get wallet info

Get {secretKey, publicKey} for all accounts in the wallet.

```ts
const walletInfo: IFullAddressInfo[] = await web3Client.wallet().walletInfo();
```

### Send MAS

Sends native MAS from a wallet address to another. If no executor is specified, the base account will be used.
`ITransactionData` is passed as a parameter to the method.

```ts
const sendTxIds: Array<string> = await web3Client.wallet().sendTransaction(
    {
        fee: 0n,
        amount: fromMAS("1"),
        recipientAddress:
            "address",
    } as ITransactionData,
    baseAccount
);
```

### Wallet sign message

Static method to sign the provided data with the given address present in the wallet. Signer account has to be specified explicitly.

```ts
const sig: ISignature = await WalletClient.walletSignMessage(
    "hello",
    baseAccount
);
```

### Sign message

Signs the provided data with the given address present in the wallet. Signer account has to be specified explicitly.

```ts
const signedMessage = await web3Client
.wallet()
.signMessage("hello", baseAccount);
```

### Verify signature

Verify a signature, returns true if the signature is valid, false otherwise.

```ts
const validSignature: ISignature = {
  base58Encoded: "signature",
};

const isVerified = await web3Client
  .wallet()
  .verifySignature("hello", validSignature, baseAccount.publicKey);
```
